label: family
text: mom and dad who divorce after he goes to college; no siblings; grew up with Soo Jin basically considered a sibling though

label: other relationships
text: bestest friends for life with Soo Jin. has a boyfriend named Sam in high school. the original center point of the 'brigade' friend group.

label: location
text: grows up in Groveport, OH; goes to college in Boston, MA; maybe ends up in NYC

label: occupation
text: studies communication and business; ends up as a fashion brand rep or something and maybe part-time writer

label: mental health
text: recurrent major depression beginning in middle school

label: voice
text: cheerful and a bit sweet, but brash

label: manner
text: very chatty, loud, laughs a lot. energetic, cheery, usually smiling; tends to come off pretty happy-go-lucky

label: aesthetic
text: spends a good while as a scene kid. always into bright colors and loud attention-getting looks. eventually shifts more from cutesy to sleek and avant-garde

label: interests
text: various fandoms and fanfiction, music, fashion, internet culture, cute stuff, partying

label: favorite bands
text: Coldplay, The Decemberists, Vampire Weekend, probably some scene bands that vance has personally not heard of lol
